name: Marble Effect - Figma Guide
description:
t's been a long time since we've done a guide, so this time we've created something special — the Marble Guide. All of these lines and design elements belong to the premium design segment, so attention to detail is vital here. We created the guide by implementing our design in such a step-be-step instruction.


⭐️ It brings great style for your fashion and beauty brand promo.

Of course, we really look forward to see your design works, so please share them and tag us. By the way, if you don't understand something, you’re welcome to DM us.

Like what you see? Spread your love. Support us with Like 💖.

We can also be friends on Dribbble, or Instagram oooor Behance. Why "or", let's be triple friends! 😁

Oh yeah, of course we also have Halo Lab Website. Still haven’t seen it?
